data.name: Insipid
data.detailed_description:
Insipid is a puzzle game for vigilance.
The game has a simple interface, where the player is presented with a field of cells of identical, at first glance, cells. The player must find and click on a cell that has a less saturated color than the rest. The higher the Player's score, the more implicit the difference between the cells becomes.
The game has two modes: Normal and Time-Rush. In Normal mode, the player can look around the field and find the cells for as long as he likes, this mode is suitable for training vision. Time-Rush mode has a timer that is updated each time the player finds the correct cage. New records are recorded only in Time-Rush mode!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1028 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz+
  • Memory: 2056 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 mb
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
